thoughts.text: The Python script to contact Instituto Hemingway via Twitter API is not able to execute because it is unable to locate the .twitter_keys file. I will need to create this file and store the API credentials in it.

- Store Twitter API credentials in this file
- Execute the Python script to send a tweet to Instituto Hemingway requesting more information about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers
- Practice speaking and writing in Spanish consistently
